textBlocks.welcomeMessage: Welcome to Demo NGO - Your demonstration organization for testing and learning.
textBlocks.aboutUs: Demo NGO is a sample organization created for demonstration purposes. Use this tenant to explore features and test functionality.
textBlocks.missionStatement: To demonstrate the power of technology in supporting non-profit organizations and their mission to create positive change.
textBlocks.contactInfo: This is a demo organization. In a real setup, this would contain actual contact information and support details.
